gov.cms.qrda.validator.web.service

Class ValidationServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.cms.qrda.validator.web.service.CommonUtilsImpl
      • gov.cms.qrda.validator.web.service.ValidationServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ValidationService

    @Service
public class ValidationServiceImpl
extends CommonUtilsImpl
implements ValidationService
    This is the implementation class for the ValidationService interface. It creates and runs validation suites using information provided by the user via form input.
    Author:
    Dan Donahue, ESAC Inc.
    See Also:
    ValidationService

    • Method Detail

      • setupValidationSuite

        public ValidationSuite setupValidationSuite(java.lang.String name,
                                            java.lang.String schematronType,
                                            java.lang.String schematronFile,
                                            java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> testCaseNames)
        Description copied from interface: ValidationService
        Creates a ValidationSuite from the arguments provided. The schematronType argument, for example "HL7", "CEC", "HQR" or "PQRS", represents a subdirectory under the QRDA_HOME/qrda/schematrons folder on the server.
        Specified by:
        setupValidationSuite in interface ValidationService
        Returns:
        a ValidationSuite object.
        See Also:
        ValidationService.setupValidationSuite(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>)

      • resetValidationSuite

        public ValidationSuite resetValidationSuite(ValidationSuite vs)
        Description copied from interface: ValidationService
        Resets the given ValidationSuite object to a "tests not run" state.
        Specified by:
        resetValidationSuite in interface ValidationService
        Returns:
        the ValidationSuite object

      • runValidation

        public void runValidation(ValidationSuite vs)
        Description copied from interface: ValidationService
        Applies the schematron of the validation suite to each of the test cases in the suite. The schematron is first transformed into an .xsl file prior to applying it to the test cases. Interim result status text is added to the validation suite and each test case as the validation process proceeds.
        Specified by:
        runValidation in interface ValidationService
        See Also:
        ValidationService.runValidation(gov.cms.qrda.validator.model.ValidationSuite)
